data.name: Hypnospace Outlaw (Original Soundtrack)
data.detailed_description:
The Hypnospace Outlaw Original Soundtrack features all the wonderfully nostalgic and quirky tracks that breathe life into Hypnospace's pages and revives the spirit of the '90s throughout the game.

From Chowder Man to Klyfka, the soundtrack includes a whole host of fake artists and music that bring back the feel of internets past and engenders new favourites across a range of genres.

Hypnospace OST Vol. 1 - Jay Tholen

Hypnospace OST Vol. 2 - Jay Tholen

Hypnospace OST Vol. 3 - Jay Tholen

3 full EPs also featured:

The Chowder Man by Hot Dad

Klyfta Selections by Chris Schlarb

Celestial Reflection by Zared (swordofkings128)
